snippet: The New England Patriots will be without their starting center, Bryan Stork, in Sunday’s A.F.C. title game against the visiting Indianapolis Colts. Stork injured a knee last weekend.
lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots will be without their starting center, Bryan Stork, in Sunday’s A.F.C. title game against the visiting Indianapolis Colts. Stork injured a knee last weekend.

headline.main: Patriots’ Starting Center to Sit Out
headline.print_headline: Patriots’ Starting Center to Sit Out
